entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
